mapper.select: SELECT CENTER_CD, CENTER_NM, CENTER_ZIPCD, CENTER_ADDR1, CENTER_ADDR2, CENTER_TEL, CENTER_FAX, CENTER_IMG, CENTER_MAP, CENTER_URL, CENTER_INFO, USE_YN, START_FLOOR, END_FLOOR, FLOOR_INFO, CENTER_PILOT_YN, CENTER_SPEED_CD, CENTER_STAND_YN, CENTER_STAND_MAX, CENTER_ENTRY_PAY_COST, CENTER_RBM_CD FROM TSEB_CENTER_INFO_M WHERE CENTER_CD = #{centerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT A.CENTER_CD, A.CENTER_NM, A.CENTER_ENTRY_PAY_COST FROM TSEB_CENTER_INFO_M A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.CENTER_ORDER ASC

WITH CENTER_RESV_INFO AS ( SELECT TA.CENTER_CD, CASE WHEN (TA.CENTER_CD = TB.CENTER_CD AND HOLY_DT = TA.RESV_DATE) THEN 'N' WHEN ( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') BETWEEN CONCAT(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TA.CLOSE_MEMBER_TM) AND CONCAT(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TA.OPEN_MEMBER_TM) ) THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS RESV_STATS FROM ( SELECT C.CENTER_CD, D.CLOSE_MEMBER_TM, D.OPEN_MEMBER_TM, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') <= CONCAT(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), D.OPEN_MEMBER_TM) THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') ELSE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + (INTERVAL '1' DAY), 'YYYYMMDD') END AS RESV_DATE FROM TSEB_CENTER_INFO_M C, TSEB_RESV_ADMSTM_D D WHERE C.CENTER_CD = D.CENTER_CD AND D.OPEN_DAY = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'d') ) TA, TSEB_CENTERHOLY_INFO_I TB WHERE TA.CENTER_CD = TB.CENTER_CD(+) AND TA.RESV_DATE = TB.HOLY_DT(+) )
SELECT A.CENTER_CD, A.CENTER_NM, A.CENTER_STAND_MAX, A.CENTER_STAND_YN, A.CENTER_PILOT_YN, ( SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM TSEB_SEAT_INFO_D WHERE CENTER_CD = A.CENTER_CD ) AS CENTER_SEAT_MAX_COUNT, ( SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM TSER_RESV_INFO_I WHERE CENTER_CD = A.CENTER_CD AND RESV_END_DT = FN_RESVDATE(A.CENTER_CD) AND RESV_ENTRY_DVSN = 'ENTRY_DVSN_2' AND RESV_STATE NOT IN ('RESV_STATE_4') ) AS CENTER_SEAT_USE_COUNT, ( SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM TSER_RESV_INFO_I WHERE CENTER_CD = A.CENTER_CD AND RESV_END_DT = FN_RESVDATE(A.CENTER_CD) AND RESV_ENTRY_DVSN = 'ENTRY_DVSN_1' AND RESV_STATE NOT IN ('RESV_STATE_4') ) AS CENTER_STANDING_USE_COUNT FROM TSEB_CENTER_INFO_M A, CENTER_RESV_INFO B WHERE A.CENTER_CD = B.CENTER_CD AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.RESV_STATS = 'Y' ORDER BY A.CENTER_ORDER
